website_summaries.verdict: At its low price point, this robe is a bargain, especially given its soft and luxurious material and high quality construction.
pros: Belted fleece robe that comes in 2 color options and has a hood for added warmth
Runs true to size and length falls below knees on most men
Material is of high quality and is very soft
cons: Fabric tends to get staticky during cold weather

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's soft
customer_reviews.text: I got this robe for my fiancé because he gets really cold inside the house during winter. And since it's been delivered, he's been walking around the house with the hood on for the past half hour, reinacting the monk scene from Monty Python and the Quest for the Holy Grail, and smacking his forehead with a Java textbook. It's hilarious, and he looks so cute and comfy in it! Very glad I decided to make this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Pickels

customer_reviews.title: Feels great and fits great
customer_reviews.text: The fleece fabric is very soft and thick. It feels well made and is warm. I purchased a size S/M and it fits perfectly. I'm about 5-foot-10, 150 lbs., and I wear a size medium in virtually all my shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: The cozy is strong with this one
customer_reviews.text: It is warm, soft and when I wear it I feel like a Jedi. A cozy Jedi
customer_reviews.author: SDyee

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Warm & comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously cozy robe! it’s basically a fleece blanket with sleeves, which is perfect in my drafty apartment. My only issue is the crazy amount of static electricity it creates, but that’s to be expected with the material & it’s easily solved. It runs large, as a robe should, I’m a 34 waist, a medium or large in shirts & I got the small/medium size and it’s big on me but that just adds to the cozyness!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cherrier

customer_reviews.title: It will make you a comfy cozy Sith Lord.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a woman, since it has the more enclosed sleeves and longer length + hood which is super expensive in the women's section. It is too big for me, but I don't mind at all, it's like wearing a cozy blanket. It is super comfy and warm, and both my boyfriend and I pretended being siths within minutes of opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy robe
customer_reviews.text: My son thinks his new robe is awesome! Hung a hook so he keeps it off the floor. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T.

customer_reviews.title: but it's comfy he says he feels like he's wrapped in a fleece blanket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this robe for my 14 year old son. He wears a men's size small this comes in small/medium size so naturally it's a little big on my son, but it's comfy he says he feels like he's wrapped in a fleece blanket. He loves this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Yudesireme

customer_reviews.title: Supple and sturdy housecoa
customer_reviews.text: I found this as a birthday present for my husband after a simple search. The product is well made, seems durable enough to withstand years of wear and is super soft. I got the gray one and was pleasantly surprised at the steely hue-doesn't have to be a men's housecoat if you don't want it to be. Good product for the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for 25 bucks.
customer_reviews.text: For 25 bucks you can't go wrong. I'm 6' x 190 and it fits just a bit large but not so large I can't wear it. It has a hood which I didn't want but it says it right in the description so it's my mistake. As I wrote not bad for 25 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: This is not a bathrobe!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not a bathrobe. First of all I washed it before trying it on and it painted all my other clothes to navy colour. When I used it for the first time ( actually it was the first and the last), my whole body got covered with navy coloured tiny thread like things. I had to take a shower again to get rid of them. Yes it is really soft but doesnt dry the water up. I think it is best to wear it to feel warm and cozy in the chilly mornings, but not as a bathrobe. I wish I could return, but the return window is already closed.
customer_reviews.author: gersoy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Super Soft! Thick cuffs, Nice large hood!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is wonderfully soft with thick cuffs and shawl. The thick Shawl with connected hood is very warm and has a comfortably Large hood. I bought one in Navy for a friends birthday. He enjoyed it so much I bought another for My Brother on grey for Christmas. The S/M would fit up to a US Mens med size and a bit larger if u dont like your robe oversized a bit. If you are Mens Large or XL go for M/L and it will still be oversized quite a bit but very very comfotable.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Other than than great.
customer_reviews.text: Im 6'1 the only thing is that it just reaches below my knees. Other than than great.
customer_reviews.author: glenn m. butler

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a father’s day gift for my husband. He showed me an ugg robe last Christmas that he liked for just over $200.00. At that cost, I put it out of my mind until it came time to give him another gift. This robe is so soft and certainly comparable to the one he showed me. He loves the hood which was his favorite part on the ugg. He walks around like a cloaked Jedi and always talks about his midichlorians????
customer_reviews.author: Chevonne Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfy robe! Unfortunately though, I’ve only had it a week and have only washed it once (I let it air dry) and the seams are already starting to fall apart. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my husband and my 16 yr old son and they love them! Hubby & Son are both on the smaller side (around 5’8” thin build) and I got the small/medium and it fits them very well. My husband loves the feel and the length (below the calf). It arrived in 2 days as advertised and the colors are exactly as seen online. The price is great for such a nice robe! Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: C Austin

customer_reviews.title: Almost not absorbent at all
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to dry me out after a shower, pretty much towel-like material. I thought this did the job, but even though the description says "The bathrobes are soft, durable and super-absorbent", it actually isn't. Shouldn't be called a bathrobe... Just a regular soft robe one can wear around the house. Going back to Lacoste, even though it's pretty pricey.
customer_reviews.author: TheBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a good quality robe. My son wanted one after my husband and I talked about how comfortable and warm ours are in similar styles. He is just hitting the teen years around 5 feet and 110 lbs and the small fit him well with room to grow. I was it and it held up nicely and I was happy to see how much he is enjoying this robe. Hopefully he won't wear it out too fast because so far he has worn it daily since receiving it. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very hard to please. I picked and ordered this robe. He was complaining before he opened the package. Knew he wouldn't like it. He LOVES this robe! He is 6'2" and 200 lbs. Got a Lg and it fits great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gini Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort and Warmth.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Robe, I Use It Every Day, It's Very Comfortable. My only complaint is the arm sleeves are a bit too short. I ordered the medium and I. 5'9" 120lbs, the overall length and cut is great, but the sleeves are a bit short for me. Makes me feel like my arms are hanging out naked lol! Bit overall it's actually comfortable as heck and instantly warms me up!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Fiancé LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé had been wanting a robe for a long time and so for his birthday in October, this is what I got him. He was really surprised and very happy with it! He wears it almost every single day since getting it two months ago. I sometimes wear it too, to take the dogs outside at night. It’s VERY warm and we both like that it has a hood. I’m also very happy with the quality for the price! One other thing, I was concerned that it wouldn’t be as long as the pictures show- but it is!
customer_reviews.author: rhub

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend as part of a self care package and he loves it. He’s always talking about how warm it is and how it fits perfectly. He gives it 5 starts!
customer_reviews.author: THEAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: The Best! Soft. Cozy. Classy looking. Soft feeling to the skin. Perfect length for the cooler months. Think of the softest blanket you've ever owned, then, think 'softer' yet, and you're about half way to how soft this house coat feels when worn. The hood, perfect and fits well (not tight on the head/neck areas). This is the Perfect gift if you're getting something for your son, husband, boyfriend, father, etc., etc). Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas G.

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because after I had surgery, I couldn't wear anything but a rope. My first, grey robe needed to be wash and I didn't have an extra one. So I ordered this one and it came just in time, it's much more comforting and soft. I'd recommend this one if you want to feel more relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Warm and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and soft fleece robe. I don’t know why absorbency is a suggested review point, the material is fleece... not known for its absorbency like terry cloth is... Anyway, I got it for my himusband for Father’s Day. He wanted a warm and soft robe and this fit the bill. He loves it and wears it all the time. It may be 100 degrees outside, but inside, it gets pretty chilly, so this is perfect! He is a 5’11”, 175lb man and the robe is very roomy around (he wears a size large and this could probably fit a XXL man or woman) and hits him at about knee length.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lea

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft robe, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe for my husband for his birthday. It is a rich dark grey color with piping around collar and cuffs. Material is very soft, the length is long as picture shows. It has a hood which is an added plus for our colder winters. My husband is 5'10", slim build, waist size is 32 and I ordered a small / medium. He has room to spare, but nice fit. It is better than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for guys who love comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Father’s Day gift and my fiancé loved it! He’s 5’7”, 180 pounds and it fit him perfectly. He loves the hood feature and said the robe itself is very comfortable. He was very pleased with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Me&Jay

customer_reviews.title: i love it!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased a new robe for my husband a couple of months ago, as he was having surgery and would need it in the hospital, i liked it so much, i got one for myself, only one with a hood. it is so soft and warm and comfy, i wish i could wear it all day and hibernate.
customer_reviews.author: bobbidee

customer_reviews.title: The robe is also feels like good quality material
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this robe for my husband. I ordered one size fits all and it fits him perfectly. He is about 5'10 and 215lbs. The robe is also feels like good quality material. I think it is a great robe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable asf
customer_reviews.text: I was hella surprised when this came in the mail and actually looked and felt like it seemed like it would. I used it all the time and wear it whenever I'm home. Whatever it's made out of, it's good stuff. It's soft and it seems like it's gonna last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David Gulland

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the material
customer_reviews.text: This is a super soft fleece like material. What a great value for something that feels more luxurious than it costs. I really use it a lot during these days of no longer leaving my condo and binge watching streaming services while drinking bourbon and crying into my glass..
customer_reviews.author: Jaredz

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Great robe for frosty winters. Washed and dried well. Generous fit which makes it all the better. Soooooft! Having the hood may seem silly but it nestles in around your neck. For me, if the back of my neck is cold, the rest of me is too. So having that hood aka thick collar is wonderful. Nice deep pockets too. Belt does not slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Geary

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is excellent. It is super plush and warm and large fits me well (6’1” medium build). But...there is no hood as advertised at least in my shipment. The neck is very plush and thick but no hood. Maybe they sent wrong product? I did not inquire as hood wasn’t my main concern rather warm and plush is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who is 6’4 slender. It’s comfy for him and me :) Goes half way between knee and ankle
customer_reviews.author: FWG420

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Warm and Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped long and hard on Amazon to pick just the right robe. And this baby is it! I got it a little larger because I like robes a little larger (think wrap-around blanket of comfort). The warm, softness and comfort are incredible! Can't wait to see how well it really warms in winter. The hood is an added bonus I should've gone for years ago. Don't think twice -- get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Gnomestead

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, lightweight robe.
customer_reviews.text: The robe feels great and the hood is a nice touch. It is super lightweight but still very warm. If you're looking for plush or luxurious, you'll probably need to spend more money. I like it, but a little more heft would be nice. For the money, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: 50 something that appreciates quality!

customer_reviews.title: shedding lint
customer_reviews.text: I used it and all over my body covered with the blue lint coming out of this bathrobe. They should have mentioned this in their product's specification. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Engin Esiyok

customer_reviews.title: Hubs isn't cold anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe during my last pregnancy in an effort to keep my eternally chilly husband warm while I kept the house at a balmy 68 or 69 degrees. He wears it every day. EVERY DAY. As he shaves his head, the hood was an exceptionally welcomed addition, and the quality was just as good as department store quality.
customer_reviews.author: amllentil2

customer_reviews.title: A bit large and oddly cut
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I should mark this as too large or too small. I'm 5 10 avg build. The arms are oddly cutout so it is comfy unless you move your arms out, then it just shoots up your arm. It is a good length, a lot of fabric for the hood. Think of a normal hoodie then triple the size of the hood. Also was shipped the blue instead of the grey. Either that or the grey is very blue. Less than $20 and its warm so solid 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes larger than I had expected. Comfortable and warm and great hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and warm. Not cotton or fabric to absorb water on your body is you’re in a hurry and don’t dry off well. I like it for comfort and warmth and to walk to my mailbox. Hood is great. Just wished I ordered a medium instead of the large. Will change to 5stars after the medium is delivered to me.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Atchio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome robe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. He loved it! It looks badass with the hood. Nice and comfy. He demanded we both have one to match.
customer_reviews.author: cirque_c

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Sure, it's not the most sophisticated tailoring, but the robe is plush and warm, it feels good, looks good and I can deal with less than perfection considering the price. I'm 6'3" and the belt is a little off but the shoulders and sleeves fit fine. The hood is very ample, very monk-like.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hooded Robe....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hoodie robe. Size s/m fit perfectly. I am 5'7 man and 165lbs. Arm length near perfect. Hoodie covers early rising messy hair. Soft and warm. Pockets, dual loop holes with belt and good length. I bought grey. Aboustly put together well and the price cant cant be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Comforting,but a little Large
customer_reviews.text: Granted, I am 6'2 and weigh 160lbs soaked and wet so I can expect it to be a little large. I love the robe as it is very comfortable and the robe is an added value. I purchased two. One was perfect but the second one's belt loops were stitched closed so the belt is not secured.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Feel like ah king
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bathrobe I've owned in more years then I can remember, but now I'm retired and I plan on wearing this robe daily, all day if I feel like it ☺ I'm 5'9 and I bought a large and it's perfect in every way, definitely will buy another, very well made also.
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, warm, and my jerk cat loves to nurse on it
customer_reviews.text: This is my man's bathrobe. It's soft, warm, and cuddly. I love to snuggle him when he's wearing it. It's so soft, it reminds our little orange jerk of a cat of his mom. He begs until we lie it down on the bed for him so he can nurse on it and make biscuits with his paws. Anyway, this bathrobe is man tested, cat approved.
customer_reviews.author: Ashigeru

customer_reviews.title: SUPER. COMFY.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, and on a day I am off work, no less! Immediately took my pants and shirt off and put this baby on. OH MY GOODNESS THE COMFORT. It's very warm, too. Probably won't use this in the summer months, but where I live, we have temps below 40F about half the year. Dude. I'm really excited about this bathrobe. Excellent quality and the price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product....BAD product packaging .
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5 star rating however. I ordered a L/XL and received what appeared to be a L/XL but when I put it on it was much smaller than the one I bought my boyfriend. When I checked the label it was a S/M . So the S/M was packaged 8n a L/XL package. Hope this was an honest mistake. Unfortunately I need it tonight so cannot wait for a return.
customer_reviews.author: TISHA FORREST

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in an L/XL to basically feel I'm wearing a blanket 24/7. I'm 5'2 and wear an S in men's so it's perfectly oversized and goes down to my ankles, something rare to find in women's robes. I doubt I'm going to wear anything else inside the house this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Carol Kinsella Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely but again
customer_reviews.text: Big and soft. Very comfy. I'm 5"1 and got the small and its a little long in the arms but I like it that way. It also has very large roomy pockets in the front which I like. Good quality and rich color. I got the dark grey. Good for gifts or if you want it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Get that cold outta my face!
customer_reviews.text: This robe keeps us so warm and comfortable I no longer feel bad about letting the house freeze over. Central heat is expensive, this robe isnt. The hood is nice for pretending to be jedi sometimes, and the material is very soft. The threads are coming undone on the robe belt, but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy !
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9" , 200 lb. Ordered the large/xl . It fits just fine . Plush and very comfy . Sleeves are just right.. not snug and plenty of room . 2 nice pockets . Hangs about ten inches from the floor . Hood is plenty large . Highly recommended .
customer_reviews.author: dugroa

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price point. Definitely pleasantly surprised. Fits as expected and a little longer than normal which was exactly what I wanted. Washes well! I washed with towels and then tumbled dry on low heat. Looks just like new after 5+ washes
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hansel

customer_reviews.title: High Quality robe. worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could wear this all the time it is that comfortable. Highly recommend. Great gift to yourself or anyone. I'm a 5'6 145 lb guy so a medium feels just a bit large but hey I'm not trying to get a tight fight on a bath robe. Worth the $ . very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: prongs

customer_reviews.title: God's touch
customer_reviews.text: You know the feeling of 10 drunk 20 year old ladies hugging you after a night out? This is how it feels wearing this robe, Its like being touched by god himself. Soft, cosy,warm, everything a man needs. Once you wear this combined with crocs sandals with white socks, you are irrisistable In my experience all the girls want to steal your soft, cosy warm robe, so i do advise buying a secured safe with it as well or pay some mexicans to keep an eye on it at all times
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert blokland

customer_reviews.title: super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my BF for xmas--he's never worn a bathrobe before so I wasn't sure if it was even a good idea. But this is now his favorite thing to wear when lounging around the house--he calls it his "housecoat" and says it's the softest, most comfortable thing he's ever worn. He loves the fact that it has a hood since he is bald! I bought him the L/XL as he is 6'1 and about 200 lbs--it's plenty roomy for him and goes about 2 inches below his knees. This was a great buy--I'm guessing most retail stores would charge $40-60 for this, if not more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rr

customer_reviews.title: Much shorter than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft and warm, but it’s way smaller than it looks in the pictures. I’m 5’3” and it only comes halfway down my thighs. I was expecting some knee coverage.
customer_reviews.author: mo_is_me

customer_reviews.title: Great! Perfect bday gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this robe for my bf for his bday. The quality is amazing and the robe is super soft and cozy. He is 6'1" and the L/XL fits perfectly. Not too short or too long and the sleeves are the right length. Would def reccomend this product 👍
customer_reviews.author: NeelyR

customer_reviews.title: Great robe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He absolutely loves it. As a sulky teenage boy, there is nothing he loves more than wearing his long black hooded robe around the house pretending to be Emperor Palpatine while hiding under the hood. The robe itself is very soft and warm. The stitching seems to be well done and the color perfect. It's been through the washer a few times already and has held up remarkably.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Parlove

customer_reviews.title: he said it’s the perfect size, roomy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband. L/XL. He’s 6ft and it comes about mid calf. Very soft, he said it’s the perfect size, roomy. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Robe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great robe. Note that it isn't as fluffy as the Alexander Del Rossa brand I believe. So you if you want something super fluffy, go for that. but if you are just looking for something a little lighter, you can go for this and you will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Parekkaden

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews concerning size issues which helped me choose the correct size to fit me the way I wanted. If you want it to fit closer to your ankle then choose a larger size, other wise choose your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel M.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: Sizing runs small. This was a gift for my son at 190 lb body frame no fat he normally wears an x large shirt. I ordered large/ x large fits snugly. He appears to like it he hadn't taken it off in the last two days. The quality of the robe is nice and the color gray is a rich color.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he loved it! He is about six foot and very thin so the robe is a little large but he says its comfortable and wears it all of the time. The only problem is that one of the pockets ripped but it was easily fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Internet shopper

customer_reviews.title: Plush, Cozy and Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. He'll come home from work, toss it in the dryer on 'fluff' to make it warm, puts it on after his shower and wears it all night. He's so in love with it and I think it makes him smoking hot. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BriiShopsHere

customer_reviews.title: SO plush!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is wonderfully plush! If you want something thick and fluffy this is it! It does shed a bit in the wash, but very comfortable, long enough (6’ tall comes to knees). Very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: 4BinDE

customer_reviews.title: Plush, soft robe that washes well! Definitely get it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this got our 13 year old son. He loves it! I ordered the smallest adult size and he will be able to continue to wear it as he gets taller. It is super soft, plush and washes well, no pilling. He loves lounging in it after he showers.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too small.
customer_reviews.text: Felt great. Seems quality. However, I am not keeping it because even at the lowest belt-loop level, the belt is across the middle of my stomach. I am 5'11" (so not overly tall), but this is made for shorter people apparently.
customer_reviews.author: irishfan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic robe solid 11/10
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bathrobe, I will use it more in the winter though. It's like if you were being hugged by angel wings all over your body
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe! It's soft and fuzzy, and very warm, especially when you put the hood up. It's been a colder than normal winter in Portland this year, so what a joy it's been to put on this robe right out of bed. As some others have said, this is not a robe you'll want to wear straight out of the shower as it is NOT water absorbent. But you simply can't beat it for warmth and comfort. And how can you beat the price?
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoV2

customer_reviews.title: Best robe I have found in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband and didn’t know what to expect. Everything about this robe is amazing. Material, size, and even the length are all just amazing. The hood is an added bonus he loves it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandalore

customer_reviews.title: Yes buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great robe. My grandson is five 8 about a hundred 60 lb. I was super super super glad I got the extra large so there is room for movement and if it shrinks it will still fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Warm and soft
customer_reviews.text: Nice bathrobe for the price. Warm and soft. Fits a little large, but there were only two sizes: sm/med and Lg/XL. I ordered the bigger one. I washed it before wearing it. Amazon Prime free 2 day shipping arrived on time. I’m very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Caputo II

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This feels great. It's is a little big but that makes it comfy. It is warm and can be worn over light clothes or nothing at all. Thin enough to be light to carry but thick and comfortable to stay warm. Great price. Wash before wear!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bokeh

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The robe was bought for my husband to change into after coming home, so he does not bring his clothes in the house after seeing patients.
